20101207192609.889|20101207192611.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THAT'S RIGHT.
20101207192611.000|20101207192612.667|CCO|THEY GOT A 13-MONTH EXTENSION ON
20101207192612.667|20101207192614.333|CCO|THAT, AND I BELIEVE, HEARING THE
20101207192614.333|20101207192616.000|CCO|CLICK, THE PRESIDENT IS RIGHT

20101207192617.667|20101207192619.333|CCO|>> GOOD AFTERNOON, EVERYBODY.

20101207192731.000|20101207192733.500|CCO|I'LL CITE THREE OF THEM.
20101207192733.500|20101207192736.000|CCO|NUMBER ONE, IF YOU ARE A PARENT

20101207194143.500|20101207194146.000|CCO|ADDED TO THE DEFICIT WITH VERY 
20101207194146.000|20101207194148.500|CCO|LITTLE ON THE SHORT TERM THAT 
20101207194148.500|20101207194151.000|CCO|WOULD HELP TO OFFSET THAT.
20101207194151.000|20101207194153.500|CCO|THE DEAL THAT WE'VE STRUCK HERE 
20101207194153.500|20101207194156.000|CCO|MAKES THE HIGH-END TAX CUTS 
20101207194156.000|20101207194158.500|CCO|TEMPORARY.
20101207194158.500|20101207194201.000|CCO|AND THAT GIVES US THE TIME TO 
20101207194201.000|20101207194202.667|CCO|HAVE THIS POLITICAL BATTLE 
20101207194202.667|20101207194204.333|CCO|WITHOUT HAVING THE SAME 
20101207194204.333|20101207194206.000|CCO|CASUALTIES FOR THE AMERICAN 
20101207194206.000|20101207194207.667|CCO|PEOPLE THAT ARE MY NUMBER ONE 
20101207194207.667|20101207194209.333|CCO|CONCERN.
20101207194209.333|20101207194211.000|CCO|>> IF I MAY FOLLOW UP, AREN'T 
20101207194211.000|20101207194212.667|CCO|YOU TELEGRAPHING, THOUGH, A 
20101207194212.667|20101207194214.333|CCO|NEGOTIATING STRATEGY OF HOW THE 
20101207194214.333|20101207194216.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS CAN BEAT YOU IN 
20101207194216.000|20101207194217.667|CCO|NEGOTIATIONS ALL THE WAY THROUGH
20101207194217.667|20101207194219.333|CCO|THE NEXT YEAR BECAUSE THEY CAN 
20101207194219.333|20101207194221.000|CCO|JUST STICK TO THEIR GUNS, STAY 
20101207194221.000|20101207194222.667|CCO|UNITED, BE UNWILLING TO BUDGE, 
20101207194222.667|20101207194224.333|CCO|TO USE YOUR WORDS, AND FORCE YOU
20101207194224.333|20101207194226.000|CCO|TO CAPITULATE?
20101207194226.000|20101207194227.667|CCO|>> I DON'T THINK SO, AND THE 
20101207194227.667|20101207194229.333|CCO|REASON IS BECAUSE THIS IS A VERY
20101207194229.333|20101207194231.000|CCO|UNIQUE CIRCUMSTANCE.
20101207194231.000|20101207194233.500|CCO|THIS IS A SITUATION IN WHICH 
20101207194233.500|20101207194236.000|CCO|TENS OF MILLIONS OF PEOPLE WOULD
20101207194236.000|20101207194238.500|CCO|BE DIRECTLY DAMAGED AND 
20101207194238.500|20101207194241.000|CCO|IMMEDIATELY DAMAGED AND AT A 
20101207194241.000|20101207194243.000|CCO|TIME WHEN THE ECONOMY IS JUST 
20101207194243.000|20101207194245.000|CCO|ABOUT TO RECOVER.
20101207194245.000|20101207194247.000|CCO|NOW, KEEP IN MIND, I'VE JUST 
20101207194247.000|20101207194249.000|CCO|GONE THROUGH TWO YEARS, CHUCK, 
20101207194249.000|20101207194251.000|CCO|WHERE THE RAP ON ME WAS I WAS 
20101207194251.000|20101207194252.667|CCO|TOO STUBBORN AND WASN'T WILLING 
20101207194252.667|20101207194254.333|CCO|TO BUDGE ON A WHOLE BUNCH OF 
20101207194254.333|20101207194256.000|CCO|ISSUES, INCLUDING, BY THE WAY, 
20101207194256.000|20101207194257.667|CCO|HEALTH CARE, WHERE EVERYBODY 
20101207194257.667|20101207194259.333|CCO|HERE WAS WRITING ABOUT HOW, 
20101207194259.333|20101207194301.000|CCO|DESPITE PUBLIC OPINION AND 
20101207194301.000|20101207194302.667|CCO|DESPITE THIS AND DESPITE THAT, 
20101207194302.667|20101207194304.333|CCO|SOMEHOW, THE GUY'S GOING TO 
20101207194304.333|20101207194306.000|CCO|BULLDOZE HIS WAY THROUGH THIS 
20101207194306.000|20101207194307.667|CCO|THING.
20101207194307.667|20101207194309.333|CCO|NOW -- WELL, BUT THAT'S MY 
20101207194309.333|20101207194311.000|CCO|POINT.
20101207194311.000|20101207194312.667|CCO|MY POINT IS, I DON'T MAKE 
20101207194312.667|20101207194314.333|CCO|JUDGMENTS BASED ON WHAT THE 
20101207194314.333|20101207194316.000|CCO|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM IS AT ANY 
20101207194316.000|20101207194317.667|CCO|GIVEN TIME.
20101207194317.667|20101207194319.333|CCO|I MAKE MY JUDGMENTS BASED ON 
20101207194319.333|20101207194321.000|CCO|WHAT I THINK IS RIGHT FOR THE 
20101207194321.000|20101207194323.000|CCO|COUNTRY AND FOR THE AMERICAN 
20101207194323.000|20101207194325.000|CCO|PEOPLE RIGHT NOW.
20101207194325.000|20101207194327.000|CCO|AND, YOU KNOW, I WILL BE HAPPY 
20101207194327.000|20101207194329.000|CCO|TO SEE THE REPUBLICANS TEST 
20101207194329.000|20101207194331.000|CCO|WHETHER OR NOT I'M ITCHING FOR A
20101207194331.000|20101207194332.667|CCO|FIGHT ON A WHOLE RANGE OF 
20101207194332.667|20101207194334.333|CCO|ISSUES.
20101207194334.333|20101207194336.000|CCO|I SUSPECT THEY WILL FIND I AM.
20101207194336.000|20101207194337.667|CCO|AND I THINK THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194337.667|20101207194339.333|CCO|WILL BE ON MY SIDE ON A WHOLE 
20101207194339.333|20101207194341.000|CCO|BUNCH OF THESE FIGHTS.
20101207194341.000|20101207194342.667|CCO|BUT RIGHT NOW, I WANT TO MAKE 
20101207194342.667|20101207194344.333|CCO|SURE THAT THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194344.333|20101207194346.000|CCO|AREN'T HURT BECAUSE WE'RE HAVING

20101207194347.667|20101207194349.333|CCO|THAT THIS AGREEMENT ACCOMPLISHES
20101207194349.333|20101207194351.000|CCO|THAT.
20101207194351.000|20101207194353.000|CCO|AND AS I SAID, THERE ARE A WHOLE
20101207194353.000|20101207194355.000|CCO|BUNCH OF THINGS THAT THEY ARE 
20101207194355.000|20101207194357.000|CCO|GIVING UP.

20101207194359.000|20101207194401.000|CCO|IS, FROM THE REPUBLICAN 
20101207194401.000|20101207194402.667|CCO|PERSPECTIVE, THE EARNED INCOME 
20101207194402.667|20101207194404.333|CCO|TAX CREDIT, THE COLLEGE TUITION

20101207194433.000|20101207194435.000|CCO|SC
20101207194435.000|20101207194437.000|CCO|SCOTT.
20101207194437.000|20101207194439.000|CCO|>> THANK YOU, MR. PRESIDENT.
20101207194439.000|20101207194441.000|CCO|LAST WEEK, THE MEMBERS OF YOUR 
20101207194441.000|20101207194442.667|CCO|ADMINISTRATION WERE BOASTING

20101207194446.000|20101207194447.667|CCO|NEGOTIATIONS TO GET TO A BETTER 
20101207194447.667|20101207194449.333|CCO|DEAL.
20101207194449.333|20101207194451.000|CCO|CAN YOU EXPLAIN HOW THIS 
20101207194451.000|20101207194453.000|CCO|SITUATION HURT YOU?
20101207194453.000|20101207194455.000|CCO|>> YOU KNOW, THE DIFFERENCE IS

20101207194515.286|20101207194516.714|CCO|GOES TO CHUCK'S QUESTION AS WELL

20101207194636.000|20101207194637.667|CCO|CAROLINA.

20101207194643.000|20101207194645.000|CCO|EMERGENCY, EMERGENCY ECONOMIC

20101207194753.000|20101207194755.000|CCO|DEBATE, AND IT'S GOING TO

20101207194814.333|20101207194816.000|CCO|LOOKING AT THE TAX CODE AND 
20101207194816.000|20101207194817.667|CCO|SAYING, YOU KNOW, WHAT'S FAIR,

20101207194913.000|20101207194915.000|CCO|>> THANK YOU.

20101207194936.714|20101207194938.143|CCO|>> WHEN YOU SAY IT WOULD SEEM

20101207194939.571|20101207194941.000|CCO|AMOUNT OF LEVERAGE OVER THE 
20101207194941.000|20101207194942.667|CCO|WHITE HOUSE, WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
20101207194942.667|20101207194944.333|CCO|>> IN THE SENSE THAT, THAT 
20101207194944.333|20101207194946.000|CCO|THEY'LL SAY, ESSENTIALLY, WE'RE 
20101207194946.000|20101207194947.667|CCO|NOT GOING TO RAISE THE -- WE'RE 
20101207194947.667|20101207194949.333|CCO|NOT GOING TO AGREE TO IT UNLESS 
20101207194949.333|20101207194951.000|CCO|THE, YOU KNOW, WHITE HOUSE IS
